string.data: Hello Commander Shepard. I am your Bespoke Weapons Fabrication VI. You may call me "BWFVI".
Or "Besweafabvi". Or whatever you want, really.
I print advanced weaponry to support the needs and engagement styles of your team.
I am legally limited by Council copyright; but if you have a manufacturer's license, I can print their stock weaponry.
But my capabilities extend far beyond stock weaponry. I can customize nearly every aspect of your fabricated weapons.
There is, of course, a material cost in credits for fabrication. And advanced weaponry will require access to specific, sometimes rare, elements.
I can customize your weapons' mass effect generators to balance kinetic impact and thermal efficiency.
I can customize your weapons' integrated thermal management systems to balance thermal efficiency and cost.
I can customize your weapons' targeting and rifling systems to balance accuracy and KICKBACK.
